  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600

  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 785x608
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 769x584
      LayoutBlockFlow {FORM} at (0,0) size 769x584
        LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 769x584 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
          LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 767x582
            LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 767x578
              LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,279) size 763x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
                LayoutText {#text} at (262,2) size 239x19
                  text run at (262,2) width 239: "This should be in the center of the page."
